name: Driving School 2020
description:
Driving School 2020 is the first driver’s license test simulator. For a start, the game includes four different categories – Car Driving, Bus Driving, Scooter Riding and Motorcycle Riding. There are dozens of different levels to get yourself comfortable with the mandatory driving license exam. Apart from trial exam, Driving School 2020 game helps you prepare for written test. Hundreds of multiple choice questions are available in the game. The game also lists all road signs with their meanings to help you prepare for written test.

Driving School 2020 might be one of the best games to improve your understanding of driving trial track specially if you are preparing for driving license test soon. Playing this game regularly will help you become comfortable with the driving trial track and master your driving skills.

Salient Features:
- Full featured driving school
- All road signs that are used in Nepal
- Hundreds of multiple choice questions
- Real trial track of Nepal for license test
- You can learn to drive a car and ride a motorcycle or scooter
- Approximately 10 challenging levels for each type of vehicle
- Car with mechanical steering and manual gear shift
- Indicator switch for car, motorcycle and scooter
- Basic traffic lights and rules

Thank you for trying our Driving School game. Please feel free to submit any feedback. We're constantly adding new levels and features to the game. Your feedback will make the game even better for everyone.

All the best!
